title: Devin Hester’s Super Bowl moment won’t be the Bears’ last

sources.name: Yahoo Sports NFL
sources.title: Devin Hester’s Super Bowl moment won’t be the Bears’ last
sources.description: Ninteen years ago, right about now, Devin Hester made one of the most ridiculous plays we’ve ever seen from a Chicago Bear, running the opening kickoff of Super Bowl LXI back for a touchdown. For the 14 seconds, there wasn’t a Bears fan in the entire country who wasn’t jumping for joy. Then after that, […]
